sources.title: 13 West Street (1962) - Full Movie
sources.description: 13 West Street (1962) - Full Movie - Starring Alan Ladd, Rod Steiger, Michael Callan

metadata.Plot: Walt Sherill is a mild-mannered space engineer who is a victim of a vicious "for kicks" assault by a teen-age gang. Increasingly obsessed by his desire for revenge, Sherill embarks on a manhunt of his own, and hampers the efforts of Detective Sergeant Pete Koleski, consequently causing some avoidable deaths.
metadata.Writer: Bernard C. Schoenfeld, Robert Presnell Jr., Leigh Brackett
metadata.Actors: Alan Ladd, Rod Steiger, Michael Callan
